name: express-api-limiter
description: express-api-rate-limit is a simple and customizable rate-limiting middleware for Express.js applications, designed to prevent abuse by restricting the number of requests a client can make within a specified time window. This package allows you to define different rate limits for individual routes, providing flexibility and control over API access.
author: Md Irfanul Alam <irfanulalamtanvir@gmail.com>
